name: WindowRemote
tagline: Full Window Control, All in one Remote!
body:
### WindowRemote.
WindowRemote is a custom remote designed to be used by Unified Remote that incorporates DisplayFusion and Windows 10 Keybinds to allow for window control all from your smartphone!

### About Unified Remote
The one-and-only remote for your computer. Turn your smartphone into a universal remote control. Control 70+ Programs from one app! 

**Unified Remote App Downloads**

* [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Relmtech.RemotePaid)

* [Apple App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/unified-remote/id825534179?mt=8)

* [Windows Store](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/apps/unified-remote/9nblggh083jx)


**Unified Remote Server** [Download](https://www.unifiedremote.com/download)

### Helpful Links
* [WindowRemote Wiki](https://github.com/Traberjkt/WindowRemote/wiki)

* [WindowRemote Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/WindowRemote/)

### About this project
The point of this project was to be able to easily control and manipulate windows on my computer from my bed. Unified remote allows me to do that but I have to focus on dragging and dropping as well as finding the mouse. I figured that I could incorporate the basic Windows 10 Command into a Custom unified remote!

This isn't a huge project but it's something I would like to expand going forward and use to improve my coding and git skills. Thanks for taking a looking!
